title: [ROLEPLAY] ROLEPLAY RULES
content:
ROLEPLAY RULES

Welcome to ProjectRP, where your roleplay journey begins! To ensure an immersive experience, please follow these roleplay rules:

  1. Character Creation: Craft a realistic character with a detailed background.
  2. Respect: Treat all players with respect, both in and out of character.
  3. Metagaming: Avoid using out-of-character knowledge in your roleplay actions.
  4. Powergaming: Play your character realistically without overpowered actions.
  5. Roleplay Language: Use appropriate language and adhere to server guidelines.

These rules contribute to a vibrant roleplay environment. Be sure to check for any additional server-specific rules.
